newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Aztech says only modest damages in copyright fight.
newsitem.headline: Aztech says only modest damages in copyright fight.

text.p: Aztech Systems Ltd said it was liable for only modest damages from its copyright dispute with Creative Technology Ltd, state television said on Tuesday.

State television said the courts found Aztech's soundcards incorporated four percent or less of Creative's programme and Aztech's lawyers felt this did not amount to an infringement of copyright at all.
The Singapore Court of Appeal found on November 13 that Aztech had infringed the copyright of Creative's "Sound Blaster" sound card software.
The Appeal Court overturned a previous Singapore High Court ruling which found in favour of Aztech.
